channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7543] SAP error during create address in Export shop
item.description:
Hi Evangelos
we got this error during an address creation in export shop.

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Body><ns2:CreateAddressRequest xmlns:ns2="http://www.distrelec.com/hybris"><salesOrganization>7801</salesOrganization><customerId>0001252107</customerId><address><billingAddress>false</billingAddress><shippingAddress>true</shippingAddress><companyName1>distrelec</companyName1><companyName3>strassestrasse</companyName3><title>Mr.</title><firstName>francesco</firstName><lastName>bersani</lastName><streetName>aklsdjfaklsdjlkf</streetName><streetNumber>333</streetNumber><postalCode>11111</postalCode><town>5555 33</town><country>HK</country><phoneNumber>+4930123456</phoneNumber></address></ns2:CreateAddressRequest></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>

 <?xml version='1.0'?>
<!-- see the documentation -->
<SOAP:Envelope xmlns:SOAP='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/'>
  <SOAP:Body>
    <SOAP:Fault>
      <faultcode>SOAP:Server</faultcode>
      <faultstring>Server Error</faultstring>
      <detail>
        <s:SystemError xmlns:s='http://sap.com/xi/WebService/xi2.0'>
          <context>XIAdapter</context>
          <code>ADAPTER.JAVA_EXCEPTION</code>
          <text><![CDATA[
com.sap.engine.interfaces.messaging.api.exception.MessagingException: com.sap.engine.interfaces.messaging.api.exception.MessagingException: java.io.IOException: Error receiving or parsing request message: java.io.IOException: HTTP Error response for SOAP request or invalid content-type.
	at com.sap.aii.adapter.soap.web.SOAPHandler.processSOAPtoXMB(SOAPHandler.java:772)
	at com.sap.aii.adapter.soap.web.MessageServlet.doPost(MessageServlet.java:530)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:754)
	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:847)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.runtime.FilterChainImpl.runServlet(FilterChainImpl.java:202)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.runtime.FilterChainImpl.doFilter(FilterChainImpl.java:103)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.servlet.AuthenticationFilter.doFilter(AuthenticationFilter.java:126)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.runtime.FilterChainImpl.doFilter(FilterChainImpl.java:79)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.HttpHandlerImpl.runServlet(HttpHandlerImpl.java:441)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.server.HttpHandlerImpl.handleRequest(HttpHandlerImpl.java:210)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.server.RequestAnalizer.startServlet(RequestAnalizer.java:441)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.server.RequestAnalizer.startServlet(RequestAnalizer.java:430)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.filters.DSRWebContainerFilter.process(DSRWebContainerFilter.java:38)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.filters.ServletSelector.process(ServletSelector.java:81)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.servlets_jsp.filters.ApplicationSelector.process(ApplicationSelector.java:278)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.WebContainerInvoker.process(WebContainerInvoker.java:81)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.HostFilter.process(HostFilter.java:9)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.ResponseLogWriter.process(ResponseLogWriter.java:60)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.HostFilter.process(HostFilter.java:9)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.DefineHostFilter.process(DefineHostFilter.java:27)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.ServerFilter.process(ServerFilter.java:12)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.MonitoringFilter.process(MonitoringFilter.java:29)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.ServerFilter.process(ServerFilter.java:12)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.SessionSizeFilter.process(SessionSizeFilter.java:26)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.ServerFilter.process(ServerFilter.java:12)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.MemoryStatisticFilter.process(MemoryStatisticFilter.java:57)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.ServerFilter.process(ServerFilter.java:12)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.filters.DSRHttpFilter.process(DSRHttpFilter.java:43)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.ServerFilter.process(ServerFilter.java:12)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.chain.AbstractChain.process(AbstractChain.java:78)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.server.Processor.chainedRequest(Processor.java:475)
	at com.sap.engine.services.httpserver.server.Processor$FCAProcessorThread.process(Processor.java:269)

item.summary: SAP error during create address in Export shop

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hello Fransesco,
This is solved. Please check and close

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7517] Deactivate automatic redirects for mobile devices (ELFA)
item.description:
The redirects of the mobile-devices should be deactivated for NL, DK, EE, LV, PL, BIZ

As far as I know the redirects are defined in apache. They will be activated with the mobile rollout on the 2.9.2015.
item.summary: Deactivate automatic redirects for mobile devices (ELFA)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Your support ID is: 10533611291503026930
@Rene: What should be displayed instead?

Wrote email to HP to let us know what is blocked here.

Answer from HP:

Hi Rafael.
Illegal redirection attempt violation details
Redirection Location http://m.test.distrelec./

What shal we display on mobile devices?

  • Maintenance page?
  • Deactivate the redirect completely so that mobile devices will stay as well on desktop shop?
Please deactivate the redirect and show the desktop page.

There was a bug in the current mobile redirection configuration, now is fixed

In Q the solution is already been transferred and we can test.

In P we have to wait the next deploy
Verified with NL Q.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7348] Export Test // Delivery address must be the same as the registration country (according to specifications)
item.summary: Export Test // Delivery address must be the same as the registration country (according to specifications)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I dont't understand this ticket.
Please add additional details.

• export shop
  • account is created (credentials above) for a customer in Cyprus
  • additional delivery addresses MUST be always in the same country, not in different countries. It was specified in ticket: http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-6657

Billing-/Shipping-addresses: The initially registered country of the customer can’t be changed. Deliveries to other countries than the original one is not allowed (only possible via customer service).
The issue will be fixed with v4.0.0 first deploy.

Here some details about the implementation.
The B2BUnit has the attribute country inherited from Company type.
It seems that this country attribute is not used and it's only filled during the migration of customers.
Therefore i've modified the registration process to always fill the country on the b2bunit.
In case of export shop address add/change the only country that will be displayed will be that one.

In quality system, since many registrations were performed before this change, i've ran the attached groovy script to set the country on the b2bunit, getting the country specified in the billingAddress.
In production this script should not be needed.
Oana, please test your tickets!

It is working that only the Country of origin is selectable however when saving the address I get an error 500 (by creating a new address or by editing it).

Reproduced:

  • Used distrelec.testing+biz.b2b.test@gmail.com / Pwd: distrelec
  • Did a checkout
  • Selected in the checkout "Ship my order to a different address"
  • Only "Hong Kong" is selectable, that is good
  • I add a few data (see printscreen Registration Customer Export.png)
  • Click on Save
  • Error 500 (Error_test.distrelec.biz_checkout_address_createUpdate_b2b_sh.pdf)

Note: Afterwards the record exists but with wrong value (e.g. Company Name) if you go edit it and don't Change those "Default System values" it crashes again.

Looks like an SAP error.
I've created the ticket for Evangelos.
The problem has now been solved in SAP.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7539] Existing customer registration issue
item.description:
While trying to register existing customer distrelecbv+b2brex00@gmail.com the warning in the shop says this account is already existing.

Problem is: There is no account existing for this ID in SAP & Hybris. (See Screenshots)

Maybe we are only checking part of the email address? distrelecbv+b2brex001@gmail.com is existing in HMC & SAP.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Neeraj, please have a look, thanks.

Registration failed!
de.hybris.platform.commerceservices.customer.DuplicateUidException: Registration for an existing customer with customer ID 0002263895 and contact ID 0000735567 failed, because the customer and the contact is already existing in hybris!

Hi Rafael,

The problem has been fixed.
Now there is no more error with email address already exists.
As you can see it's relevant message appear now with customer not found.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7530] DK //Error in text in cart.
item.description:
From: Nielsen, Kasper
Sent: Mittwoch, 26. August 2015 14:12
To: Ilie, Oana
Cc: Burlet, Rafael
Subject: Error in text in cart.

 

Hi again,

 

We have an error in text, in the shopping cart, both on the Danish and English website. In this picture I am logged in as a B2B customer and here is the text incorrect. This text should be as you see below.

 

 

 

B2B customer = Priser excl. moms (English version = Prices excl. VAT)

 

B2C customer = Priser inkl. moms (English version = Prices incl. VAT)

 

 

Med venlig hilsen

 

Kasper Nielsen

Intern Teknisk Sælger

 

Telefon: +45 8624-6422

Mobil:     +45 2530-0973

Telefax: +45 8624-6433

[1]Kasper.nielsen@elfa.se

[2]www.elfaelektronik.dk

 

 

 

Elfa Distrelec A/S

Kontor på Sjælland                      Kontor i Jylland

Naverland 2                                    Haslegårdsvej 8-12

2600 Glostrup                                8210 Aarhus V

 

 

This e-mail, including attachments, is intended only for the person(s) or company to whom it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. Unauthorized storage, disclosure, copying, use, modification, distribution and/or publication of this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient may be unlawful and is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete this message and notify the sender immediately.

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] Kasper.nielsen@elfa.se
[2] http://www.elfaelektronik.dk/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

impex files are already modified as wished by Peteris.

imported.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7526] Existing Customer Registration - thank you text
item.description:
register.successThankYouText.approvalByCSNeeded

 

EE –

Registreerumise lõpetamiseks peab klienditeenindus teie konto üle kontrollima ja kinnitama. Järgmise tunni jooksul peaksite saama klienditeeninduselt e-kirja konto aktiveerimise kohta. Kui teil on enne seda vaja kiiresti tellimus esitada, võtke palun ühendust meie klienditeenindusega telefonil

+372 660 5327

 

NL

Om deregistratie te kunnen voltooien word uw account eerst gecontroleerd en goedgekeurd door de klantenservice. Binnen het volgend uur ontvangt U een activatie e-mail van onze klantenservice. Moet u in de tussentijd dringend een bestelling plaatsen, neem dan contact op met onze klantenservice:

 

DK

For at afslutte din registrering skal din konto først behandles og godkendes af kundeservice. Du vil få tilsendt en aktiveringsmail fra kundeservice indenfor den næste time. Såfremt du skulle have brug for at placere en ordre hurtigere, så bedes du kontakte kundesupport på telefonnummer + 45 86 24 64 22.

 

PL

 

Celem zakończenia procesu rejestracji, założone konto musi zostać sprawdzone i zatwierdzone przez właściwą jednostkę. Na wskazany przy rejestracji adres e-mail, Nasz Dział Obsługi Klienta powinien wysłać w ciągu kilku godzin link aktywacyjny. Jeżeli potrzebujesz pilnie jeszcze przed aktywacją konta złożyć zamówienie, prosimy o bezpośredni kontakt telefoniczny z naszym Działem Obsługi Klienta:

 

LV

Lai pabeigtu reģistrāciju, mūsu klientu serviss izskatīs un pārbadīs Jūsu pieteikumu.

Tuvākās stundas laikā Jūs saņemsiet  aktivizācijas e-pastu no mūsu klientu servisa.

Ja Jums ir nepieciešams nekavējoties ievietot pasūtījumu,

lūdzu sazinieties ar klientu servisu:

Tel.: +371 67885544

E-pasts: [1]latvija@elfa.se

 

EXP

To complete the registration, your account must be checked and approved first by the customer service.

You should get an activation email from Customer Service within the next hour.

Should, you need urgently in the meantime to place an order,

please call our Customer Service: [2]export@distrelec.com ; Tel.: +31 30 265 01 25

 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] latvija@elfa.se
[2] %20export@distrelec.com

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7511] Change LV Homepage Elements
item.description:
On the following page:
http://prod.distrelec-lv.distrelec.com/

Numbers are according to the screen shot:

1. (lv) List import change to Augšuplādēt sarakstu (NOT DONE)
2. (lv) Latvia change to Latvija (DONE)
3. /B2B change to /Uzņēmums (NOT DONE)
4.
From:
Komponenten
Werkzeuge & Messtechnik
Automation
Netzteile & Licht
Computer & Hobby
Change to:
Komponentes (DONE)
Mērinstrumenti & Instrumenti (NOT DONE)
Automātika (DONE)
Barošanas avoti & Apgaismojums (NOT DONE)
IT & aksesuāri (NOT DONE)

5. In "Mainīt iestatījumus _emphasis_Distrelec Latvija" change to Elfa Distrelec Latvija (NOT DONE)
6. (lv) Latvia change to Latvija (DONE)
7. Kanāls change to Klienta veids (NOT DONE)
8. "Ņemiet vērā, ka, mainot valsti, jūs atteiksities sistēmā un jūsu grozs tiks dzēsts!" change to "Ņemiet vērā, ka, mainot valsti, Jūs tiksiet atslēgts no sistēmas un Jūsu ieprikumu grozs tiks dzēsts!" (NOT DONE)
______
Please in all cases:
Change Distrelec Latvija to Elfa Distrelec Latvija (NOT DONE)
(lv) Distrelec Store B2B change to: Uzņēmums (B2B) (NOT DONE)
(lv) Distrelec Store B2C change to Privātpersona (B2C) (NOT DONE)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

(lv) Distrelec Store B2C please change to: Privātpersona (B2C)
please test after deployment of v4.0.2 on http://test.distrelec.lv

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7435] Export - Address in the same country
item.description:
Export - Though this mistake was reported a number of times and Jira says its closed or resolved (tickest 6657, 7348, 7248), customer still can edit the country when creating new delivery address.
Please make sure that:

1. When new customer registers, the invoice and shipping COUNTRY MUST BE THE SAME.
2. Customer is not allowed to change country for shipping address.
3. Customer can add new shipping address to the existing one (to have few shipping addresses) but again, ONLY in the same country
4. Customer is not allowed to edit or create new Invoice address.
5. We should allow to add new contact person without any problems though. This is not working. Its reported as bug by Mats Ek.
item.environment:
*Location*: http://test.distrelec.biz/
*User-Agent*: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/44.0.2403.130 Safari/537.36
*Screen Resolution*: 1920 x 1200
item.summary: Export - Address in the same country

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Will, Could you please take care the mentioned points are taken into account? Thanks.
reproducable on Q. Will solve it in my local env.

Already fixed by francesco in trunk (v4.0.0). Its working as expected locally. If you register for the export shop and you want to add a new delivery address you can only add an address with same address from the invoice.
asked reporter for re-test.
The new added shiping address is not shown in SAP, however a delivery block "Carrier Address check" is set?

When adding a new shipping address it wont be copied into SAP.
Just a delivery block 90 Carrier Address Chk"?
Hi Evangelos, Please let us know if this is the desired outcome from SAP side? In my opinion it could make sense to let customerservice proof new addresses for export shop..

Hello Rafael,
Please test the checkout shipping address as it seems it gives errors.
1. Change existing shipping address, updates all the billing, shipping, sold-to accounts
2. Add new address gives an error.
3. Adding a shipping address is not showing from the beginning you need to play around a bit with the billing address on top.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7421] DNS: wrong: elfadistrelec.no - elfadistrelec.se
item.description:
Hi René

Uns sind zwei URL aufgefallen die noch falsch laufen.

Könntest Du diese bereinigen lassen?

elfadistrelec.no = läuft nicht
elfadistrelec.se = verlinkt auf die Dänische Seite.

Kannst Du mir mitteilen wann das ausgeführt wird?

Besten Dank für Deine Bemühungen

Gruss
Wolfi

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
elfadistrelec.se war bereits eingerichtet -> elfa.se
elfadistrelec.no ist jetzt eingerichtet -> www.elfaelektronikk.no
DNS Anpassung kann bis zu 24h dauern.
configuration done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7339] Maintenance page on Q not working
item.description: During the deployment on Q yesterday i saw that the maintenance page is not working.
item.summary: Maintenance page on Q not working

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Can you please check the maintenance page on Q and P.

Hi Rene,

I checked it today. It is working on dev system without any problem.
yes please test on Q.
I need to reset all my password for Q and P environment.

Hello Surendra

This is how the maintenance page looks now on production.
(see screenshot)

Hi Rene,

It is working in Q when I have tested it.

Regarding the production environment, It will not work, since we have not updated the maintanance page, in which it still has the old one. If everything fine in Q, then we can update the maintance page in P. This is what I made the comment in the old maintance page ticket.
If the new maintenance page is no ready yet why the old on is not working?
Hi. The new one is working in the test. But not in the production, which has old configuration. I have not done anything in the production configuration till now.
The rest will be done is ticket: DISTRELEC-4234

This is still not working.
http://test.distrelec.ch/maintenance/?backurl=http://test.distrelec.ch/

@Francesco
Can you please take care of it!

This is low priority

We need to freshly check the new configuration.
Please test the maintenance page with the next deploy

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7330] Export Shop // Delivery terms: add more information in the labels
item.description:
Standard (1-2 days, max. 5 kg. Price 10 Euros)
Economy (3-5 days, max. 20 kg. Price 37 Euros).
item.environment:
*Location*: http://test.distrelec.biz/
*User-Agent*: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; Trident/7.0; .NET4.0E; .NET4.0C; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; InfoPath.3; rv:11.0) like Gecko
*Screen Resolution*: 2021 x 1263
item.summary: Export Shop // Delivery terms: add more information in the labels

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Evangelos, (and Nabil Benothman | Distrelec)

currently we have only these types in our webshop (see attachment).

For this new text in the Export Shop, I guess it also impacts SAP right? Or you have to provide a new type or something?

Thanks

Hello Ruben,
The code are remaining the same. User by standard means the N1 and by economy the E1. This requirement is not correct and they will have to adjust their freight values as standard is cheaper than economy and this is funny. I have already raised that topic to business.

Ok so it looks there is nothing to do FE side, right?
For the moment I set the status to Blocked.
Thanks
Evangelos, please update the ticket as soon as you have an answer from business, thanks.

Hello Oana,
You can close this from my side. I have updated the costs on the sap side.

Oana Ilie | Distrelec, Evangelos Kontopoulos | Lodestone

this ticket can be closed right?
the labels should be modified in the HMC

Hi Oana,

I think there is nothing to do FE side. Either is BE or SAP side.
Anyway I did a test in my local environment and it seems to look fine. (attachment)

Could you test again please?
Thanks
Hi Will, please check if it is working now or if BE work needs to be done to solve this, thx.
delivery modes are in the shop as expected. prices are coming from SAP.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7227] Street number does not break in cause of to long street name
item.description:
Case 1: If the street name has multiple spaces the name breaks correctly to prevent overlapping the city information. (screenshot "correctBreak.png")

Case 2: If the street name fit on the first line it will not break. But the street number will then may overlap the city information. The street number should also be considered when calculating the break. (screenshot "streetnumberDoesNotBreakChrome.png", "streetnumberDoesNotBreakFirefox.png")

Case 3:
The street name is to long and has to less space characters to break it. Maybe a cut with an added "..." or an hyphen with a break could be a better solution.
(screenshot "nospace.png")

Reporter: Rex Sigarlakie
E-mail: rex.sigarlakie@distrelec.com
item.environment:
Google Chrome Version 43.0.2357.132 (64-bit)
and
*User-Agent*: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; Trident/7.0; .NET4.0E; .NET4.0C; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; InfoPath.3; rv:11.0) like Gecko

https://test.distrelec.nl/checkout/address
item.summary: Street number does not break in cause of to long street name

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Really trivial bug, which should not have a high priority regarding implementation. I assign this to you to decide when to assign to a developer and sprint.
Changed non-breaking space between street name and number to regular space. Also truncates very long street names, adding three dots (ellipsis) at the end.
asked reporter to re-test.

Answer from tester:

I do not see any changes so we have still the same issues within Internet Explorer. See screenshots.

Strange, it looks like my changes to the style sheet was overwritten. New try!
This time also taking care of long street names in My account Address list.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7050] Removal of shop-availability logic (DE)
item.description:
The expanded availability flyout on the detailpage should be removed ONLY for Germany AND all ELFA. (according to Oana)

It will be shown again after the availability logic review is done and we're sure to show correct data to the customer.

today we display:
24h avialability = CDC Warehouse
10d availability = Järfela Warehouse
more than 10d = Nänilon Warehouse

In reality, today for DE, the delivery is done only from CDC, so the other 2 warehouses do not matter

For new ELFA (when we Go Live) - there will be deliveries from CDC only (24h avialability = CDC Warehouse) . No further availability should be shown, or calculated in the back-end.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Rafael

good Point!! For SE, NO, FI go live, the only availability logic for ELFA + DE will be CDC.
High-level estimate of 8h added.

Hi,

what should be removed exactly ? please check the screen shot and tell me which part should be removed. Thx

only the 24h line should be kept.

the 10 days and more than 10 days should be removed. This goes for all new SAP countries, Germany included.

Please assign to FE developer as discussed.

/Nabil.

Please test after the next deployment.

Rafael Burlet | Distrelec Please add the correct fix version to this ticket: v3.5.4
Please double-check if this is your desired outcome - for me it looks fine.
all good

Hi Nabil

as discussed all ELFA test & P need to be configured on CDC only as the only warehouse, and only for 24h availability

as for pick up, there is a pick up in:
LV, LT, EE, SE (Solna only, not Jäffälla anymore)
Please review as discussed.

Dear all,

Regarding the availability Display, the following has been decided and approved by Ove/Pieter/David G.:
Countries: Latvia (LV), Estonia (EE), Lithuania (LT), Poland (PL), Denmark (DK), Netherland (NL), Export

Please setup the following condition for the above countries:
Primary Warehouse - Fast Delivery: 24 h, Warehouse: 7371 (CDC)
Secondary Warehouse - Slow Delivery: 7 d, Warehouse 7311 (CH)

That has been decided by Ove (Head of sales) after discussion with Pieter (Head of Logistics) and David Gaskin (Purchasing)
-> Already done in ticket 7157.

Germany does not have a secondary warehouse for now.

Thx.

I'm attaching the newest Matrix on the availability Settings.
Hi Will, please verify David's last comment. Francesco should have solved it with ticket DISTRELEC-7157. Please close both tickets if it is ok, thx.
I will clarify that with Nabil & Francesco.
needed to fix SE / NO. the others were fine. ready for Q deployment.
